item.title: Pediatric Island Style 2017 Handouts
item.description: Mahalo for registering for Pediatrics Island Style on November 2, 2017! By popular request, we are distributing the handouts electronically this year. This allows us to get these to you faster, saves you conference fees, and helps the environment! Below are links to download the slides in various formats (1 slide per page, 2 slides per page, etc.). Please download the slide format of your choice to your phone, tablet, or laptop before the conference.
